        public Player(IntVector pos,

        constructs a new Player element
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • setInfiniteLaserMode

        public void setInfiniteLaserMode(boolean mode)
        Sets the targeting laser mode (this affects drawing only). InfiniteLaserMode true: laser will draw to the end of the screen if there is a clear path. InfiniteLaserMode false: laser will stop on the last column that has tiles on it
        Parameters:
        mode - if true, InfiniteLasermode will be on.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        This method draws the player cannon to the screen

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(boolean animate,
                   IntVector pos)
        Description copied from class: GridElement
        set the position for the geometry of the GridElement. if pos is null, the command is ignored
        Overrides:
        moveTo in class GridElement
        Parameters:
        animate - shows movement animation if true
        pos - target position

      • generateTile

        public Tile generateTile()
        generates a tile with a color depending on the next color to shoot the next color to shoot is then randomized
        Returns:
        the tile of the color to shoot (this is centered on the player's position)
